caller_intent: The caller wants to pay a commercial workers' compensation policy renewal for 'Flying Disc Company' directly over the phone, preferring a routing number payment to avoid fees.
resolution_steps: Agent accessed the policy system to locate the Flying Disc Company's work comp policy.
Confirmed the payment amount ($333.33) and explained fee differences between routing number and card payments.
Collected the business's routing number (07200326), account number (897202138), and email (Tony@wildlife.com) for confirmation.
Processed the payment via routing number and scheduled email confirmation.
Confirmed completion and offered further assistance.
knowledge_required: Fee structures for different payment methods
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance's internal policy management system
summary: Caller successfully processed a workers' compensation policy renewal payment for Flying Disc Company using a business checking account's routing number. The agent explained fee differences, collected banking details, and arranged email confirmation. The caller confirmed no further assistance was needed.
